message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $13000 is a bit over my budget. I'm willing to pay $10500. Would you consider that?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11750.
